sentences.english: You can reroute the train and save the five people.
sentences.chinese: 你可以改變過車的行進方向去救那五個人。

sentences.english: The coffin was carried by six soldiers walking in lockstep .
sentences.chinese: 靈柩由齊步行進的六名士兵擡着。

sentences.english: He insinuated his cat through traffic.
sentences.chinese: 他駕車慢慢地行進於來往車輛中。

sentences.english: But dozens of trains were rerouted, causing massive delays.
sentences.chinese: 但是數十輛火車改變了行進路線，造成大量延遲。

sentences.english: In march forward in the process to have sacrificed servicewomen, everyone is enormously.

sentences.english: The detective detected that the arch was under the marching Arctic architects’ protection.
sentences.chinese: 偵察察覺拱門受到行進的北極建築師們的保護。

sentences.english: Backcountry travel may involve travel over both trails and off-trail areas.
sentences.chinese: 野外行進包括在小徑上和小徑以外通過。

sentences.english: Thousands of people lined the processional mute.

sentences.english: Double-time the troops to the mess hall.

sentences.english: We were still there at dusk, when we pulled in to Kimberley.
sentences.chinese: 黃昏時分，我們仍在往金伯利行進。

sentences.english: He turns and marches away ponderously to the right.
sentences.chinese: 他轉過身，邁着沉重的步子向右邊行進。

sentences.english: Drawing the spot arranges the thin turning the diagram, and personnel's line enters the circuit diagram.

sentences.english: The cart jolted along the rough road.
sentences.chinese: 馬車在崎嶇不平的道路上顛簸行進。

sentences.english: They threw their chests out when marching in parade.
sentences.chinese: 他們在列隊行進時都挺起了胸膛。
